statements: SELECT * FROM bicycle_warranty_information
SELECT warranty_id, warranty_period FROM bicycle_warranty_information WHERE warranty_period > 12
SELECT * FROM bicycle_warranty_information WHERE warranty_terms LIKE '%limited%'
SELECT warranty_id, warranty_period FROM bicycle_warranty_information ORDER BY warranty_period DESC
SELECT warranty_id, JSON_VALUE(registration_details, '$.customer_name') AS customer_name FROM bicycle_warranty_information
SELECT * FROM bicycle_warranty_information WHERE warranty_id = 1;
SELECT warranty_terms, warranty_period FROM bicycle_warranty_information WHERE warranty_period > 12;
SELECT * FROM bicycle_warranty_information WHERE warranty_terms LIKE '%limited%';
SELECT warranty_id, warranty_period, registration_details FROM bicycle_warranty_information WHERE warranty_period < 24;
SELECT * FROM bicycle_warranty_information ORDER BY warranty_period DESC;
SELECT * FROM warranty_info;
SELECT id, warranty_period, registration_date FROM warranty_info;
SELECT terms FROM warranty_info WHERE warranty_period > 12;
SELECT id, registration_date, warranty_period FROM warranty_info ORDER BY warranty_period ASC;
SELECT customer_name, address, phone_number, bicycle_model FROM registration_details WHERE bicycle_model = 'Mountain Bike';
SELECT * FROM warranty_info WHERE id = 1;
SELECT registration_id, customer_name, bicycle_model FROM registration_details WHERE address LIKE '%Main Street%';
SELECT id, terms FROM warranty_info WHERE warranty_period > 12 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM registration_details WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY registration_id ASC;
SELECT id, registration_date FROM warranty_info WHERE registration_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM warranty_information;
SELECT warranty_id, warranty_period, warranty_terms FROM warranty_information;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_information;
SELECT * FROM bicycle_information WHERE bicycle_id = 1;
SELECT bicycle_model, manufacturer_name FROM bicycle_information;
SELECT * FROM warranty_information;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_information WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT bicycle_model, manufacturer_name FROM bicycle_information ORDER BY bicycle_model DESC;
SELECT * FROM warranty_information WHERE warranty_period = '1 year' OR warranty_period = '2 years';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone_number FROM customer_information WHERE customer_phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM warranty_periods;
SELECT warranty_id, period_start, period_end FROM warranty_periods WHERE warranty_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM warranty_registration ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM warranty_registration WHERE registration_id = 2;

SELECT wd.warranty_id, wt.term_description, wr.customer_name FROM warranty_details wd JOIN warranty_terms wt ON wd.term_id = wt.term_id JOIN warranty_registration wr ON wd.registration_id = wr.registration_id;
SELECT * FROM warranty_periods;
SELECT warranty_id, period_start, period_end FROM warranty_periods WHERE period_start >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT wt.term_description, wr.customer_name FROM warranty_terms wt JOIN warranty_details wd ON wt.term_id = wd.term_id JOIN warranty_registration wr ON wd.registration_id = wr.registration_id;
SELECT wr.customer_name, COUNT(wd.warranty_id) AS warranty_count FROM warranty_details wd JOIN warranty_registration wr ON wd.registration_id = wr.registration_id GROUP BY wr.customer_name;
SELECT * FROM warranty_details wd JOIN warranty_registration wr ON wd.registration_id = wr.registration_id WHERE wr.customer_email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM warranty_periods;
SELECT warranty_name, duration FROM warranty_periods WHERE duration > 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM warranty_registration ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT bicycle_name, brand, model_year, color FROM bicycle_information WHERE brand = 'Trek';

SELECT bicycle_name, warranty_name, term_description FROM bicycle_information JOIN warranty_bicycle ON bicycle_information.id = warranty_bicycle.bicycle_id JOIN warranty_periods ON warranty_bicycle.warranty_period_id = warranty_periods.id JOIN warranty_terms ON warranty_bicycle.warranty_term_id = warranty_terms.id;
SELECT * FROM warranty_periods WHERE duration > 1 ORDER BY warranty_name DESC;
SELECT warranty_name, duration FROM warranty_periods WHERE duration BETWEEN 6 AND 12;
SELECT registration_id, customer_name, registration_date FROM warranty_registration WHERE customer_email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM warranty_bicycle wb JOIN bicycle_information bi ON wb.bicycle_id = bi.id WHERE bi.brand = 'Trek' AND wb.warranty_term_id = 2;

SELECT wb.id, bi.bicycle_name, wt.term_description FROM warranty_bicycle wb JOIN bicycle_information bi ON wb.bicycle_id = bi.id JOIN warranty_terms wt ON wb.warranty_term_id = wt.term_id ORDER BY wb.id DESC;
